basics.name: Jonas Pedersen Vean
basics.label: Mathematician
basics.summary: A Norwegian mathematician specializing in partial differential equations and nonlinear analysis

work.name: Norwegian University of Science and Technology
work.summary: Supervised and assisted students from a wide variety of academic backgrounds in the subject MA1011 Basic Calculus I.

education.institution: Norwegian University of Science and Technology
Norwegian University of Science and Technology

publications.name: Global Bifurcation of a Nonlocal Equation
publications.summary: Global bifurcation analysis of a nonlocal, nonlinear dispersive equation. The bifurcation equation contains two nonlocal terms, which led to interesting results concerning monotonicity, nodal properties, and highest wave solutions.

publications.name: [In preparation] On a Nonlocal Equation
publications.summary: Ongoing project. See the project page.

publications.name: [In preparation] Symmetry Analysis on Nonlocal Equations
publications.summary: Ongoing project. See the project page.

projects.name: Applied topics in numerical analysis
projects.summary: Self-study and refurbishment in various topics from numerical mathematics with implemented methods and examples by way of programming and visualization.

projects.name: Programming projects
projects.summary: Endeavours to learn and gain expertise in various programming languages, usually in the spirit of applied mathematics, data visualization, or useful scripts for everyday tasks or analysis thereof.
